metadata.title: CVE-2022-0711 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the way HAProxy processed HTTP responses containing the"Set-Cookie2" header. This flaw could allow an attacker to send craftedHTTP response packets which lead to an infinite loop, eventually resultingin a denial of service condition. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is availability.

criterions.comment: haproxy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
